website_summaries.verdict: This case offers some serious protection – if your iPad will be near water at all, this is an ideal case.
pros: Makes your iPad Air waterproof in up to 2 meters of water for an entire hour
Completely seals the tablet from dirt and dust as well
This lightweight case also includes a screen protector
cons: The screen protector doesn't always fit exactly and can have a rainbow or oil-slick effect

customer_reviews.title: Keeps moisture out!
customer_reviews.text: This iPad case has been serving us very well. IPad belongs to my 8yr old disabled son, he uses his device most of his waking day. My son drools alot and tries to chew on the corners of his ipad. This case has been perfect at keeping wetness from getting into the ipad. I have purchased many cases for my sons device, looking for one that would keep moisture out and protect from drops and bumps, this case has done exactly what it claimed to do. I am VERY happy with this purchase and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alady McSomeonestine

customer_reviews.title: Toddler proof and so lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Lifeproof case for my iPhone - otter boxes are so bulky and the case has stood up to not only my abuse but my toddler's. When I got an iPad I was trying to figure out what case to get....the otter box was cheaper and this one didn't have nearly the reviews and history behind it, but It figured I'd give it a try because of how much more I like the iPhone Lifeproof case. Well, I love it...keeps the iPad very, very usable and adds so little bulk and weight for so much protection. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Durand

customer_reviews.title: It's a LifeProof, need I say more? I've ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a LifeProof, need I say more? I've had every one of my cell's (galaxies and iphones) in lifeproof products, so when I saw this for sale, I had to get it for my ipad. I take it out in the field for remote camera targeting and I'm not afraid to get it wet or worried about mud or impacts. Will it stop a bullet? Obviously not! But it will keep your investment safe from dust, moisture and the rigors of normal to medium/heavy use. I've carried it through a heavy manufacturing facility where welding smoke and metal dust are a fact of life and the screen cleans right up.
customer_reviews.author: BWS

customer_reviews.title: It's ALRIGHT.
customer_reviews.text: This case is nice and seems to protect my ipad air well, however, it is EXTREMELY hard to push buttons now. You have to put some serious effort into pushing the home button, volume buttons and power button at the top. I don't even try to push the power button anymore as it rarely works.. I just go through setting and turn off my ipad that way. If those weren't an issue than this would be a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good. However
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good. However, there are some disadvantages. 1. The home button is not pressed well. So I made a home button on the screen in the iPad setting. 2. The rubber packing on the rechargeable connector part falls off well. 3. It is quite inconvenient to watch video because it can not be mounted. 4. So I bought an ikross kitchen mount. There are quite a few disadvantages, but it is too strong for the use of my little child and I am using it quite satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Park Chonghyun

customer_reviews.title: Would love to give it less then one star for customer ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in September 2017. My Ipad screen cracked last month (March 2018). I sent a message to find out what to do when the lifeproof case does not do it's job. There response was cannot help me! I believe my $70.00 cost to repair screen should be under the warranty. I am just asking on how to do so. Zero help on how to do so with the manufacturer from this seller! Would love to give it less then one star for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Charityfox

customer_reviews.title: These cases will NOT disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Lifeproof FRE cases are hands down the absolute best cases I’ve ever seen. We use these on our iPhones, too. We’ve dropped on ceramic tile, cement, and far exceeded what should have damaged our devices and they’re perfectly fine! As far as fit - I know some people have mentioned trying to use this on other iPad models. I can tell you that it does NOT work on the regular iPad 9.7” devices. We have an iPad 9.7” 6th generation and the volume and power buttons do not line up.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Edit 1-12-19 .. have had this for 4 month already cracking and no longer protecting my iPad.. doesn't stay snapped shut. I'm very careful with my iPad so this is just ordinary daily use. Good screen protection. Hard to snap into place. Buttons do not line up correctly making them difficult to use. There appears to be several places where my iPad Air is still exposed. I’ve had this iPad for approx 6 yrs, when out of the case it appears brand new thanks to the previous cover, am hoping this one performs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cover.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this for my Ipad. I used it while traveling for work and had no issues. The home button is a little hard to press at first but after awhile it deforms and becomes easier to use. I don't use it around the house because it does add weight and is a little bulky compared with just the IPad by itself. I did test to see if it was in fact waterproof and it does seem to be water resistant with a little dip in the sink. The case can be harder to separate. I found it easier to use a quarter to insert and twist.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case for the iPad Air!
customer_reviews.text: This is an all around great case for the iPad Air! I have a Lifeproof cass for my iPhone and I couldn't resist buying one for my iPad. It heavily protects the iPad from 4 different proofs while still keeping the iPad Air very slim and light for the user:) My favorite part of the case is the clear back, it is just stellar! Looks absolutely awesome:) I've also noticed there is hardly any rainbow effects in the case which is awesome! My phone which is full of the rainbow effects, yet the iPad has hardly any:) I really love the case and I'd highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great protective iPad case:)
customer_reviews.author: Luke Harry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my iPad Air (1st Generation), no complaints at all. It arrived in the official Lifeproof box with all the contents inside. Not to mention I got it for an unbelievable cost of only $10!!! I mean seriously these cases typically run you $80+ in retail stores, so this purchase was a no-brainer. If you are looking for a lightweight and protective case for your iPad Air 1st gen, than this is the perfect case for you! I am very happy with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SauceyBiscuit

customer_reviews.title: Durable and versatile  product
customer_reviews.text: We've used these cases for at least 3 years and we highly recommend any one interested in or in need of having a durable case that can handle drops but also have attachments for slinging the ipad over your shoulder. We use our Ipads for surveys. Rather than make our Surveyors carry the device all day, we attach the additional strap and have more confidence in the life of our devices. Must recommend for anyone who needs to use there device a lot or for children.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R LSI

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't use the screen
customer_reviews.text: I mainly just wanted something like an otterbox for my iPad, not necessarily something waterproof. The screen of the case made it very difficult for the screen of the iPad to react to touch, so I ended up have to take the iPad out of the case just to use it, which essentially defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: but for the price it was a great value and I knew what to expect when I ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Ipad 5 (2017) . The camera opening does not line up perfectly with the lens but there is no distortion of the camera picture that I can tell. Also do not expect to use the Touch Id feature either because the case does not allow it since it was made for an IPad Air 1st gen. but for the price it was a great value and I knew what to expect when I bought it because I had tried it out at local retailer before I bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J Lock

customer_reviews.title: Great Case as expected
customer_reviews.text: Already have a Lifeproof on my husband's iphone, so only made sense to get one for his iPad Air. They only recently made the ones available for the Air, so we had to wait awhile. Make sure when you are looking that you are getting the right thing for what you need. Looks like it'll hold up to some abuse just like his phone case has.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: What makes the IPad Air is that it outer case is thinner and lighter.The only drawback is its a very delicate,one drop and broken screen.This case is pricey but it's fortefi with strength and waterproof.Ive dropped mine twice and I think it's paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: chuck reeser

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received this today, replacing an otter box that was showing wear. So far, so good. Fits perfectly, easy to install. Crisp, clean look. Everything works, although the sound and on/off buttons are tight. I think this will get better with use. For the price, this seems like a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Like2Read

customer_reviews.title: Fits the iPad 5th gen!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 5th generation iPad (not the air) almost perfectly! The only issue is the volume buttons don’t line up but I don’t mind. The case is strong and nice looking. Im glad to have found it for this price compared to the others that are almost 3x more!
customer_reviews.author: SandraD

customer_reviews.title: I would love it if it didn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I would love it if it didn't leak! After trying the leak test where you submerge it in the sink before placing your iPad inside mine had quite a bit of moisture in it. I am sure it was sealed completely. Thank goodness my iPad wasn't in there. But they do send you a new one if that happens. So just be sure to leak test before placing your water sensitive, Expensive iPad in it thinking it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rosainz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have owned apple products for several years, and never had a screen crack. I had my iPad Air in this case for a week, and the screen shattered. I don't feel that we treated it particularly roughly since putting the case on it, but it was very disappointing. The product did not deliver on what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: this is a Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It fit the Air great I like the protection it adds to Ipad the screen works just like the main screen great for boating
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Volume button doesn’t work on case
customer_reviews.text: Volume buttons on the iPad don’t work when the case is on, it’s like the buttons aren’t close enough under the case, because upon inspection they do seem to line up. My son has resorted to using his teeth to push down hard which then makes it work. Horrible I know. Very annoying and definetly wouldn’t recommend this case. Also the rubber around the edge is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D

customer_reviews.title: Well built, sturdy case
customer_reviews.text: Great, authentic Lifeproof case! I just bought it along with my new iPad Air and it fits perfect. It's a little hard to put the iPad in silent mode, but all Lifeproofs are kind of hard to faniggle when you first get them. The color is great and the see through back is a great touch to see my new space grey iPad. I'm about to go overseas and I think this case will hold up being thrown around in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Young

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one just like this when we bought the original iPad. Loved it, great to know I can read in the tub and not have to worry about frying my pad. But the latch to plug in broke and it was no longer waterproof. Hence why we bought this one. Same thing, just has a latch that works again. Back in business!
customer_reviews.author: scrapbook fan

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: We use our iPad Air in my son’s room while he sleeps to play a white noise app. For some reason with this cover on, the app/white noise wouldn’t stay on. It was fine once I took the cover off. This cover also majorly distorted the sound of the iPad and you can’t press the power button at all. The cover just completely covers up that button. Will be trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Reed

customer_reviews.title: I bough it at the current price but I will happily pay full retail for the new one when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Survived being in a fire. Case was not exposed to heat but a lot of water and soot. Got it off the counter in our restaurant we were using it for our drive through register. The firemen dropped the ceiling down on it and drenched it with water. I bough it at the current price but I will happily pay full retail for the new one when I get a new ipad.
customer_reviews.author: purplearrow

customer_reviews.title: Screen Causes Glare
customer_reviews.text: Although this case may be waterproof, there is a glare caused by the plastic screen that makes it look like there is moisture underneath. We have taken it apart twice, which is no easy task, and cleaned both screens but the stupid glare remains. Thinking about just cutting the plastic screen protector off. I would think there are better IPad protectors out there.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a pretty sold case
customer_reviews.text: Passed the submersion test and allows access to all the ports and buttons. Looks like a pretty sold case, but - of course - makes the sleek and light iPad Air a bit bulky and heavy. The screen protector looks like it is easy to clean and does not hinder the touchscreen operation, but leaves air bubbles in between the screen and the protector, which, on a very light or dark screen, have that oil spill look.
customer_reviews.author: Holger Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Disappointing product and weasely seller.
customer_reviews.text: My screen cracked inside this case! I've no idea how but I'm certain it wasn't dropped from any high height. I had just had the screen replaced and now I need to do it again. And the worst part is that the seller won't do anything and instructed me to direct my complaints to the manufacturer. Since when is that a store policy?? Don't waste your money on this case or this seller.
customer_reviews.author: N. Shwarma

customer_reviews.title: Not a guarantee for a safe iPad...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed sturdy and protective, nice neck strap fully encased but provides false sense of security. IPad screen shattered when it fell off a bed onto carpet!...very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cannot push power or volume buttons
customer_reviews.text: This lifeproof case was waterproof and was very durable but you couldn’t push the buttons in at all. The power button was almost impossible to push in and so were the volume buttons. Yes I bought the right case for my iPad Air 1. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William D

customer_reviews.title: Hm
customer_reviews.text: While it is a ok case that does "protect. It really grips and pushes on the buttons especially the volume button and power buttons and wont stop putting pressure on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Condensation on screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the case a lot but I have to open it everyday to clear the moisture/condensation that accumulates under the top and is annoying. Im going back to using an otter case. I bought two. One I cant return seeing its used but the second one I bought is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Chemoboy

customer_reviews.title: Lifeproof vs, Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: Loving my Lifeproof FRE case. I had an Otterbox for my iPad but it's plastic screen protector was always fingerprinted and it smudges and scratches easily. I'm hoping that this is not true with the FRE Case. So far, so good. No scratches and it does not smudge and/or fingerprint like the Otterbox did. Also, it's waterproof, which is a super bonus. It is also much lighter that the Otterbox which was bulky and rather heavy. So, yeah! LifeProof wins.
customer_reviews.author: James Lucas

customer_reviews.title: the only thing I don't like is that the clear water scratch protector does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I can not recall how many times my kids or me drop by accident the tablet on the floor, thank god I have this cover, the only thing I don't like is that the clear water scratch protector does not let u see very well and give you the rainbow effect, but better that than loose my tablet or u can do what I did, just remove it. lol best product ever !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ONE ONE

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was so cheap because it was a second or if it was just junk? Impossible to get on & off! Almost like it didn’t really fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Essence

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Lifeproof. I’ve been very happy with their products and they have a great warranty. I’ve been using their cases for all my mobile devices for years and will continue to buy their products as long as they keep up the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: LifeProof “excellent product keeping you I-Pad safe from damage”
customer_reviews.text: After searching all over were I live, Amazon came through for me with my second Lifeproof for my Second generation I-Pad Air. Fits perfectly like my last one lasting 5 years. I was told my I-Pad is getting to old and LifeProof only selling them in stores for 3&4 generations. LifeProof is a great product for both I-Pad and I-Phone.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.J

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant case for iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: This is a good case for iPad Air. Will not work with iPad Air 2. Pros: Good protection Water resistant Built in screen protector Many accessories available from Lifeproof Cons: Fingerprint reader not 100% Screen protector isn't replaceable (you need to buy a new Lifeproof front plate if it gets damaged) Lifeproof accessories can be expensive This will NOT work on any iPad other than the Air 1, double check to make sure that your model is compatible at:  Use the above website as the iPad packaging (box), typically, does not show the generation.
customer_reviews.author: Dqu

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for the iPad Air.
customer_reviews.text: A little too tight. Right model for the particular iPad, just fit a wee bit too tight to work properly. Otherwise, lifeproof generally works really well, even against my kids’ heavy-handedness with electronics.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: 6 month later and it's falling apart
customer_reviews.text: It was just 6 months ago when i purchased this item and rubber has started to peel off and also plastic has cracked under the charger cover. Bad quality and i would recommend to stay away if you want a cover to last longer than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love lifeproof cases! Has held up incredibly well! Not sure how amazon has such a great deal on these, but absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Smith

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you want to keep your iPad
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. Has saved my iPad from breaking and from water damage. My 3 year old has done her best to make sure it works as it should and it has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tanasha

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I'm stoked to finally have my iPad protected after almost 2 years BUT the screen always seems to have a weird rainbow like oil like look where it's touched in certain areas. I've tried to clean both the "screen protector" and the iPad screen and they're still coming up not sure why. HOWEVER that doesn't take away from the great product just wish I could figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyNick

customer_reviews.title: My iPad's Hero!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case has kept my iPad Air 1st Generation safe for close to a year now. I am not gentle on my toys. This case turns my fragile iPad into a rugged, durable device. I would give 5 stars, except the rubber parts are hanging off.
customer_reviews.author: NeverSayNeverAgain

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Junk
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced junk. My iPad shatter to dust in this case almost as soon at was in. I’ve been using it just to keep the glass shards from getting out for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and durable!
customer_reviews.text: 3+ years of use and still intact. Scratch resistant! well made and good plastic-rubber material! Buttons are a little hard to press but you get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof and almost...adult proof...
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as it promotes...in my case, it saves my iPad from the wrath of small children. Downside to this product? Once it's on, it almost near impossible to remove. So clean your screen AND MAKE SURE TO DRY IT COMPLETELY before attaching this on. I also had issues with how hard it is to push the power and volume buttons on the side.
customer_reviews.author: bunra long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Life proof case works great. Looks good. Just a case no stand with this. I work in a dusty environment and this case is the ticket! Very good price on amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: What a great case. I use my iPad on my boat ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great case. I use my iPad on my boat for primary navigation. Loading the boat, the iPad went into the drink. Down 5-6 feet. No problem, no leakage. This has a very low profile. All buttons work perfectly. Screen is just as sensitive as if there were no screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great case needs a stand!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with this case is that you have to hold it up, or prop it up when you type. No stand makes it tough sometimes. Everything else about this case is awesome! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. May

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient
customer_reviews.text: A struggle to get on, then the trim came loose. Difficult to charge the battery. A great idea that needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case has been a life savor!!! My kids have drapped, thrown and spilled stuff on their ipads and it still works. There isnt one scratch on their pads. its still intact. wear and tear has been very minimal.
customer_reviews.author: NMT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Protect as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: While 'protected' with a LifeProof case, a short drop caused the screen to shatter. I called their support line and was told they would refund the case. The case isn't damaged, just the 'protected' contents. The product is advertised to meet certain drop standards and I feel the case doesn't meet the advertised care. Buy a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case to protect an expensive purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Feel very good about my purchase to protect my sons iPad. Don't have to worry now. I know it is protected against accidental drops and spills. A++
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like it alright. It fits my iPad Air (not 2) very well. The camera and all of the buttons line up like they're supposed to, but I haven't really used it around water or anything since I don't really use my iPad around the tub or pool. It looks good but there is a bit of a wavy rainbow on the screen which is quite annoying. I feel like for the price the screen should be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lari Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof case!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and maintain! I’ve used this iOS in the shower, hot tubs, at the lake... great case!
customer_reviews.author: Ross S.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! It surely protects my ipad. I was concerned that the touch screen capabilities would have been negatively affected by the fact that I put a screen protector on the actual device. But it has worked like a charm! Very happy with this purchase! I have not submerged in water so I cannot attest to that feature. But as far as shock protection above water it is great!
customer_reviews.author: k_houston

customer_reviews.title: Ipad still working after falling off roof of van travelling 45MPH
customer_reviews.text: We put these on all of our sales force's iPads last April. One of them left his iPad on the top of his van this morning. We used the Lost Mode and a supervisor found it on the side of a road where the van was probably going around 45MPH. The case protected the iPad beautifully and saved our company from having to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Henry

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: easy to attach, worked perfectly underwater. also easy to un-attach. not as bulky as I thought it would be so that was a pleasant surprise. all in all a great product. keep up the good work guys!
customer_reviews.author: Josh SY Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best tablet case, it has its quirks, but dont let it stop you from buying it!
customer_reviews.text: I love lifeproof cases, each of my apple devices has one because i go places where a naked iPhone wouldnt make it. The Fre for iPad is a tad difficult to put on at first because dust gets under the screen while putting it on, but ive found that putting it on using a vacuum to clean the screen protector as you put it on helps keep dust at a minimum. Once its on, dont take it off and it will last you the life of the tablet and more!
customer_reviews.author: AMZ08

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my IPad Air. It works great! Protects wonderfully. It’s now waterproof, dirt proof and shock proof! Lifeproof cases are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: scottieintx

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 11 months ago. Cover that seals up charging opening has broken and water tight seal is gone. Warranty information on the purchase site is almost nonexistant. REASON- 30 day warranty!!!!! I will not buy another product from them and shame on Amazon for allowing such poor products on their site.
customer_reviews.author: H. L.

customer_reviews.title: falls apart after a few days use
customer_reviews.text: unfortunatly this case has already started falling apart. The grey rubber part is all pealing off in one peice. It did not protect the ipad when it was accadently droped the only thing it protected was my sons hands from the glass on the broken screen.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: keep the ipad from getting screen cracked
customer_reviews.text: so far this has worked great on keeping the screen protected. We do find it hard to push the home button through the case. but I prefer that to getting screen replaced.
customer_reviews.author: jeannemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great protection & light weight
customer_reviews.text: The best iPad cover we’ve had!! I’d give it more stars if I could, it’s light and protects the iPad completely even the screen
customer_reviews.author: Jennaj

customer_reviews.title: Small issues...
customer_reviews.text: The volume buttons (really only a problem when using gamepass) and rear camera don't line up with the case making them unusable.. Outside of that it is awesome, feels comfortable to hold and should I drop my iPad it feels like it'd survive.. I mostly use my iPad at the gym but if I wanted to go hiking or to the beach not being able to use the rear camera would be frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This works well. It's made well and works great. We have a disabled daughter and this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: IssysDad

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit. My only complain is to the design ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, perfect fit. My only complain is to the design not the seller is the exterior volume buttons are hard to adjust. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: iMotoPilot

customer_reviews.title: Typical Lifeproof
customer_reviews.text: It very durable. My 7yr old can't seem to damage it. It's pretty sturdy, and HEAVY.
customer_reviews.author: IT Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I like that the case isn’t bulky like many’s others tend to be. I typically don’t like built in screen protectors because they don’t fit tightly against the screen but don’t have that issue with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Danilisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your iPad
customer_reviews.text: I love LifeProof for iPads they are amazing. Lifeproof for iPhone are horrible. I completely recommend this product for iPads.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable product
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable product. Not sure on how water proof it is. I see a lot of holes in the bottom of the case. But, its durable, its protecting my ipad and it seems to be a great case! Thanks for the great price on a durable product.
customer_reviews.author: InnoTechMI

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy case. At first I had difficulty putting it on but then I realized I needed to use a little more strength:-)
customer_reviews.author: Micheline

customer_reviews.title: Case appeared to be very rugged and durable. Unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: Case appeared to be very rugged and durable. Unfortunately the camera lens portal was mis-located and obscured the front camera lens preventing the camera from functioning. Also, the volume control button were in the wrong location (too low) and didn't function either. Might be a case of my iPad being a newer model (I just bought it) or a design problem. Caveat emptor. I have returned it and ordered an Otter Box Defender. Hopefully that will solve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carl N.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It arrived exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I’m super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m super impressed!!!! The price is amazing. I see reviews saying that water leaked into their case but I bought it more or less to protect it from baby drool lol. So this is a steal. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Makes your iPad screen fragile AF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You have got to be kidding me! I've had this iPad for years and never cracked the screen or had any issues whatsoever. I wanted to change up the look so I bought this case. Within 3 hours of picking it up my iPad screen has a crack going across the screen because I tapped.. TAPPED it against the side of my desk! I gasped and picked it up to look closer and the crack spidered out! I am BEYOND LIVID with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Rubber strip falls off of left side of case, does not affect performance of the case.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t my first LifeProof product, and I’m for the most part impressed. I bought a flawless used iPad Air, and this compliments it really well. I got both for a steal. The little silicone strip that covers up the part where the optional portfolio attachment is too big so that keeps falling out, I’ll probably leave it open and out the piece back in the box. If that wasn’t a prop Len I’d be giving it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Drool & Slobber tested
customer_reviews.text: This case is so much value for so little money. Purchased this for my nephew because he slobbers and is wild. He will throw the iPad and drool all over it & this thing keeps it safe. It's nice to let him be entertained in the car and not worry if it will break. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Shattered screen after first drop
customer_reviews.text: Had the case of for 2 weeks. And on the first drop at about 3 1/2 feet out of my hands the screen cracked. Not a mild crack. Completely shatter across the entire screen. Don't recommend the case as "life proof" I though the case looked great. But untill this incident I fell other wise
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great case WORTH every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second iPad Air LifeProof case I bought the first one about 18 months ago when I bought my iPad. It worked so well after some many falls and spill on the ground and into water. It was starting to show wear on the case but the iPad inside is still in mint condition I would reconmend the LifeProof cases to anyone who like to keep there gadgets in tip top shape.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good case for price!! Front clear bit is only durable to prevent scratching but overall I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for household protection
customer_reviews.text: Was super happy to have this case, water proof and light weight. Definitely not a heavy duty case and you should still be some what cautions but I love it and it’s perfect for people like me who spill.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Meeker

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy. DO not buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it worked well enough until the part that snaps over the charging port broke. So I ordered a 2nd one. The new case didn't fit together correctly, and ended up bending my iPad quite badly!!! Will be filing a claim with the company. NOT happy. DO not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 months screen cover “cracked”...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LifeProof case. The first one lasted about 2 years until the small piece that snaps on and off over the charging port broke. The 2nd case I purchased less than 2 months ago already has two small cracks in the screen cover. I’m not even sure how that could happen.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and he’s pretty rough on it
customer_reviews.text: Works well, have it on 6 year olds iPad Air. So far so good and he’s pretty rough on it. A bit difficult to change the volume, but once you get the feel for it, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Always an awesome case. I wish Lifeproof went back to this design. Much better than the newer design (with no built in screen cover).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It’s very light weight.. good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are a bit stiff... hopefully it will be flexible with use over time
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: ... a lifeproof case as it kept my phone in perfect condition for years
customer_reviews.text: Expected more for a lifeproof case as it kept my phone in perfect condition for years. But the design of this case has many flaws. First it can be a struggle connect the charging port. Don't trust the headphone port at all if I was to drop it in water. Worst part is the back of the cover as it is clear and scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: COMMANDER SHEPARD

customer_reviews.title: Airtight!
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of time to get it securely on your device, but once on it has a tight seal. I purchased it so when I have my iPad by the pool or outside during the summer I wouldn't have to worry about it getting wet. I have my Nook app on this and felt comfortable taking it in the pool when I was on a raft so that I could read my book.
customer_reviews.author: Cathelyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: This case is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This case is Awesome. I bought two of these for work and am so glad I got the case with the built in screen protector because I'm not sure the screenless one would have worked. I have taken both iPads out with me doing survey work during multiple consecutive days of torrential rain and bush whacking. Each case held up to being heavily used in the rain and snow, dropped onto rocks, stepped on (luckily not too forcefully because of caulk boots) and constantly being in a vest pocket full of pine needles bark and dirt during hiking which didn't cause much, if any, chafe marks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this case.
customer_reviews.text: Edges are falling apart and we haven’t had it very long. Not standard life proof quality
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyFam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit IPad Air. I re searched this over an over. F ing case doesn’t fit. Not sure why this is so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Justin s.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this several months ago this device works very well. I have four very rambunctious children and this case has stood up very well to lots of punishment. I highly recommend this case to anyone and it has a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: JYARENKO

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously!? Worth the money! Why is the black one 80$!? The white in my opinion is much nicer looking! Bought for our daughters IPads! We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Elizabeth Scott

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Protects my iPad very well. Use it as a records keeper for soccer matches and I don't have to worry when it rains or when it gets dropped. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Beware - does NOT fit the Ipad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with this case per se, but beware that it does not fit the Ipad Air 2. I bought it because when you do a Amazon search for waterproof cases for Ipad Air 2, this one will show up in the list. I know it is to a degree my own fault for not paying really close attention, but in my opinion, if you are searching for a case that will fit a specific product, only cases that fit that product should appear. Case has been returned and Amazon does make returns easy.
customer_reviews.author: Eberg

customer_reviews.title: - Good case, simple design
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Good case, simple design. - Access to all ports. - Screen cover is super transparent. Cons: - A tad heavy - Many headphone jacks won't be compatible. You can't use right angle adapters.
customer_reviews.author: MaDog3

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use Lifeproof for my phone and love it, so it was a no brainer to get a case for my ipad. I don't know that my ipad will go to as many locations as my phone, but I wasn't taking any chances. My phone has been through days at the beach, dropped in snow, on pavement, kayaking, multiple mud runs and is holding strong. My phone is almost 4 years old and looks brand new thanks to the case. Highly reccommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: DaiseeJane

product_meta.title: LifeProof FRĒ iPad Air Waterproof Case Retail Packaging - WHITE/GREY (1ST Generation iPad Air Only)
product_meta.description:
THE INCREDIBLE LIGHTNESS OF AIR
LifeProof frē for iPad Air is heavy-duty protection for your lighter-than-air tablet. Featuring LifeProof’s four-proof protection, frē shields Air from drops, dirt and complete submersion. And the smart design allows total tablet functionality. From classroom to boardroom, jobsite to campsite, with frē for iPad Air, the sky’s the limit. Or is it?

LifeProof frē for iPad AirView larger View larger UNBELIEVABLY SLEEK PROTECTION — YOU’D THINK IT’S BARELY THERE
Designed to work with every feature, function and control — just as Apple designed — frē melds seamlessly with iPad Air. This waterproof case is so unbelievably slim and light, you think it’s barely there until you’re glad it is. The thinnest and lightest waterproof iPad Air case ever made, LifeProof frē protects your tablet from day-to-day dangers without adding unnecessary bulk. It’s more than protection — frē equips iPad Air to do more, in more ways and places than ever.

VIRTUALLY UNSEEN SCREEN PROTECTION
Equipped with LifeProof’s proven protection technology, the LifeProof frē for iPad Air case features a built-in touchscreen scratch protector. Crafted from an advanced membrane material that’s so super thin and optically clear, your eyes can barely see it and your finger can barely feel it — but your touchscreen thanks you for it. That way, when you’re reading, watching, FaceTiming or surfing the web, you never miss a beat — or a pixel.

SMALL SIZE. EXPANDED CAPABILITY.
LifeProof’s legendary four-proof protection is just the beginning. Incredibly thin and unbelievably light, frē for iPad Air barely adds to the weight and profile of your tablet. What frē does add is a level of protection, functionality and beauty not found in any other waterproof iPad Air case on the market. That means less case and more iPad Air. Plus, with the sleek profile, barely-there scratch protection, optical-glass lens, enhanced speaker port and full device function, it’s everything you need to take flight with your Air.

EVERYWHERE. EVERYDAY. EVERYTHING.
It’s amazing that a case so sleek, slim, smart and protective can expand iPad Air’s capabilities so much. But of course, we made it that way. In fact, it’s the most amazingly sleek, slim, smart and protective case ever made for iPad Air. With LifeProof frē, your iPad Air is no longer confined to the living room. It can handle all of life’s happenings — and mishaps. LifeProof eliminates the worry — you live and share the action at hand.

View larger BUILT TO EXCEED SPECIFICATION – AND EXPECTATIONS
Every LifeProof case is built to stringent specifications, then tested to ensure maximum protection for your delicate device. The first spec is impact rating MIL STD 810G-516. Cases built to this spec survive the drops, vibrations and bumps your device encounters day to day. Next is ingress rating IP-68. This international standard for water and dust ingress protection means your LifeProof case keeps water, dust and snow out. And finally, every case undergoes a Water Test at our factory before it’s shipped.


LIFEPROOF FRĒ FEATURES
 * Water Proof: fully submersible to 6.6 feet (2 meters) for 1 hour
 * Dirt Proof: totally sealed from dirt and dust
 * Snow Proof: completely closed to snow and ice
 * Drop Proof: Survives drops from up to 4 feet (1.2 meters)
 * The thinnest, lightest, all-protective device case ever made
 * Built-in scratch protector delivers complete touchscreen protection
 * Complete access to all buttons, ports and controls
 * Maximum sound output and clarity
 * Anti-reflective optical-glass camera lens
feature_bullets: Water Proof: fully submersible to 6.6 feet (2 meters) for 1 hour
Dirt Proof: totally sealed from dirt and dust
Snow Proof: completely closed to snow and ice
Drop Proof: Survives drops from up to 6.6 feet (2 meters)
The thinnest, lightest all-protective case available for iPad Air
Built-in scratch protector is virtually invisible to the eye and touch
Complete access to every button, control and port
Slim case follows iPad Air's sleek lines and highlights Apple's design
Dirt Proof: Totally sealed from dirt and dust
Snow Proof: Completely closed to snow and ice
